nodes.text: Level 1315 was a level of the Coruscant underworld, one thousand three hundred and fifteen levels from Coruscant's core. This held the location of a secret warehouse where Letta Turmond had visited before acquiring a supply of nano-droids. On this level, both Asajj Ventress and Ahsoka Tano were attacked by a Dark Jedi who stole Asajj Ventress' lightsabers. Here, Ahsoka was finally captured after being discovered next to Nano-droid canisters.
